com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements

Class Requirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.requirements.Requirement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArriveRequirement, ChestRequirement, CountdownRequirement, DeliverRequirement, InteractRequirement, PositionRequirement, PossessRequirement, SlayRequirement, TalkRequirement, TimeRequirement, VanquishRequirement

    public abstract class Requirement
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a specific requirement needed to achieve a goal in a quest. Requirements are the gnitty-gritty details of how to achieve a goal. Examples inlcude:
    • Kill a boss
    • Reach the village
    • etc
    Requirements are required to perform their own event checking and are required to update their containing goal when upon state change. In addition, requirements must

      • getDescription

        public abstract java.lang.String getDescription()

      • isCompleted

        public boolean isCompleted()
        Returns whether or not the current requirement is completed. Requirements that may change back and forth may return false even after a call to this method had previously returned true. As a result, this method should always be called each time a parent goal is checking its own completion status. This method makes an internal call to update state information to make sure that the value returned is current.

      • activate

        public abstract void activate()
        Sets this requirement to be active, listening for events and updating based on them

      • updateQuest

        protected void updateQuest()
        Notifies the parent goal of a status chain, usually causing a re-evaluation of criteria to update the goal's status

      • update

        protected abstract void update()
        Perform a check against requirement criteria to update state information with correct value.
